name: 1 Second Detective
description:
There are cases to solve! Dots to connect! It’s time to play detective! But you get only 1 second worth of a clue. Will you be able to figure out that case cracking clue in 1 second? Stimulate your grey cells, and play as the ‘One Second Detective’.

  • Each case is a set of four clues.
  •  Analyze them to reach a conclusion. 
  • But there’s a downside– the detective gods have damned you, and the clues reveal themselves to you for only 1 second - at a time.

As idiosyncratic as it may sound, wait till you play the equally idiosyncratic cases.

Harness the power of the smallest unit of time – a second – to make a big impact on the dilemmas presented here.
